A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: To avoid being an \"echo chamber\"\, I won't belabor and rehash the same points over and over again.   I realize that after 40 years\, characters would evolve.  However\, it's apparent that Rian Johnson completely misses that CORE VALUES actually define a character\, and those don't change.   His treatment of Luke in this episode was horrible.   Beyond that\, there were enough plot holes overall to fly a star destroyer through.   As a standalone film\, this film had great shots and the humor was genuinely funny.   The problem of course\, being this wasn't a standalone film.....this was the 8th episode of a continuous saga\, and it felt even more disconnected than the last one did!!
